import React from 'react' // import * as BooksAPI from './BooksAPI' import '../App.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { render } from 'react-dom'; class BookShelf extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render() { const { shelf } = this.props; return (

{shelf.title}

  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
) } } export default BookShelf;
